case.state: Today I am L'Arachel, the harvest festival princess of peerless beauty!
Seekers of summer fun! Intrepid beach-goers! Be amazed as the dazzling L'Arachel joins you in your festivities! Feel lucky?
Friends of justice! Allies of righteousness and order! Know that I, L'Arachel, have arrived!
Ah! ~Player~! I hadn't expected to meet you here. It must be divine providence! What's all this?
Servants of goodness and allies of righteousness! Take heart! The wandering beauty, L'Arachel herself, has arrived!
I, L'Arachel, strike in the name of righteousness, order, and Rausten!
Wh-what?! What trickery is this? Explain yourself!
Begone, shade! None can counterfeit the beauty and grace of L'Arachel!
What manner of fool do you take me for? Begone, apparition, or I will smite you myself!
I would expect better from any imposter of mine. Do you truly think any will mistake you for me?
~Player~, why are you looking at me that way? And do you know... immodest woman?
Wha-! To think, the monsters would pursue me this far...!
Oh, pardon me! I had no idea I would be playing with a pegasus knight!
What kind of armor is that? Your... thighs... are completely exposed!
You seem vaguely... draconic? Well, it hardly matters at the moment. Let us begin!
Oh, pardon me! I had no idea I would be playing with a pegasus knight! You are one, are you not?
I was unaware I would be playing with... lecherous men such as this one. Perhaps I miscalculated.
My word! W-What are you wearing? Have you no decency?
Oh, you bear a striking resemblance to a legendary swordswoman. How interesting!
That girl with the funny box sounds uncannily like me. Curious... we shall investigate later.
What an awful smell... this place is far worse than I thought! Come, ~player~, we must make haste!
I see... I am to face a succubus. Very well. One as blessed as I could never lose to such a base creature at anything!
To think there would be a massive firefly here on top of everything else... the mysteries of this place are really something!
Such overwhelming radiance... could there be a divine presence in this very building?
Are those... wings? But you don't seem to be a manakete or a monster...
Will you lower that hood? I find it to be rather poor manners. Don't you agree, ~player~?
Ah, I see you have brought a retainer. N-Not that I have a retainer or anything!
Ah, you look strong, if not a bit primitive. You could be a fine asset on my sacred mission.
Oh, I've never seen a creature like that before. Is it friendly?
Oh! It seems there is a zombie afoot. Very well, then it falls to me to banish her from this sacred land!
How odd. I have a bad feeling in the pit of my stomach, yet I cannot tell why.
Such a rare opportunity for us to go to the beach... ~player~, we mustn't let this chance slip away!
Perhaps I took a wrong turn... I was meant to be going to the beach...
I was looking for the beach, but I suppose a stop at the pool suits me just as well!
How wonderful it is to see you again, ~player~! With our combined efforts, there's nothing we cannot do!
Pardon, but could one of you perhaps direct us toward a beach?
You may look upon me for now. Such peerless beauty is difficult to ignore, after all!
I will show you the splendor that is L'Arachel in action! Bear witness!
I'll allow you the pleasure of my company. You'll be spending all your time with me!
Are you gambling?
What? ~Player~... why would you engage in such...
Are you gambling?
What? ~Player~... why would you engage in such...
Perfect! I won't be needing any more, thank you!
Of course! This must be providence!
The things I put up with to bring light to this world... ~cards~!
~cards~, quickly! Don't hold us up!
Your best ~cards~, at once!
Take these ~cards~, if you please, and give me something that befits my refinement and grace!
I believe ~cards~ will suffice, for now.
Give me ~cards~, at once!
~cards~! Don't hold us up!
~cards~ I say, worthy of a princess!
Simply grant me ~cards~. I'm sure divine providence alone will ensure that I prevail!
The finest ~cards~ you have, please. I should say I deserve them!
~cards~, if I may.
I have need of ~cards~.
I can't lose with ~cards~ more.
Surely this is divine providence!
Ha! This would be fun, if only it weren't such a detestable vice!
Dashing!
Take that! And that! Watch, as I wield my staff with such grace! I'll whack our enemies with it!
Of course, I expected no less! When you're as blessed as I, you take these things for granted!
I would never have anticipated finding you here, ~player~.
Joshua once taught me all manner of card games. It seems I haven't lost my skill!
Haha! Exactly the sort of quality deserved by the Princess L'Arachel!
The Light of Rausten herself deserves nothing less!
~Player~, you need not worry about me this round!
How exciting! I-I mean, this only assists me in teaching you a lesson!
I'll go all-in! Wait, wrong game. Even so!
Peerless quality for peerless beauty! How fitting!
It is far too late for such cards to curry my favor!
Marvelous! Why, it's only natural that I should succeed!
Ha! The just reward for this test I'm under!
This came far too late... but it will suffice! More of this, from now on!
Mwahaha!
Ah, I understand! Of course! An endeavor with a noble goal naturally draws comrades in arms!
Anything I win will, of course, be funded toward noble causes.
Out of a natural curiosity, where else do you all like to whittle away your time?
Of course I know what I'm doing; I know precisely what I'm doing!
Magvel is simply crawling with foul creatures. I'm glad to say it's quite different here!
Do you truly think this will suffice for a woman of my stature?
Excuse me! A pr-... proper lady deserves far better! But as I am a gracious woman, I'll give you another chance.
Hmph! Don't think I'm clueless! I know the failings of what I've been given; fortunate for you that I've protection from above!
That which I'm given is only a part of providence; I know what you have won't compare!
One as blessed as I shouldn't have any trouble drawing victory from this!
I shouldn't lament what is still a fair set, but you can already see far too much of me!
This is hardly worth a princess's time! I may even lose! ~Player~, do something!
I must succeed in spite of these cards. Rausten's honor demands it!
What a middling performance. I'm reminded of the nation of Frelia. Isn't that funny?
Is there not a more proper version of this game? Perhaps Rausten would benefit from such a thing.
There is no recourse by which I might win back my clothing, is there? No? How absurd!
Oh, dear... perhaps I'll sit a round out. I trust that won't offend.
~Player~! Tell the dealer I wish to trade again. No one will mind; they should be honored simply seeing Lady L'Arachel in this state!
This won't do. ~Player~, I demand your assistance. Don't delay!
I grace you all with my presence and this is how I'm rewarded? Hmph!
I see...
Wh-what is the meaning of this? Explain yourself!
How disappointing.
If I weren't so forgiving, I'd storm right out of here!
This must be a test from the gods!
~Player~, accept my protection for this round. We still have work to do!
What a loathsome, frustrating practice. ~Player~, hurry and let us begin a new round!
Rennac? Rennac! Honestly, where is that man? He should know better than to abandon his employer!
Now that you know my true identity, there is no excuse for these!
Hmph! If I didn't know better I'd think you didn't care if I lost!
What a spate of misfortune. ~Player~! I demand another attempt!
Did you not hear me earlier? I am Princess L'Arachel, holy light of Rausten! These cards are useless to me!
How am I expected to banish darkness with this sort of display?
Mmm! ~Player~, another chance! This simply won't do! Are you listening?
How frustrating! Do you not see that my -- Hah... I'll show you!
Rubbish! Is this your offering to the princess of Rausten?
Pitiful! Not even a -- Hmph... I'll have the last laugh, you'll see!
I demand another chance! Such a hand will never do while I'm... a-and you're all...!
What? While I'm... Aha! This must be a plot against me! ~Player~, I require your aid!
Oh! How curious. I suppose I've learned something on this day.
Th-This isn't fair! At least grow some for everyone! Most of all, me!
I know not what you mean, but you look much like Chihiro. Perhaps I have been blessed with insight on her position?
I-It's still there! So then Chihiro's... actually a male! To think, I was deceived this long!
How did I let myself be fooled by her... I'm basically doing the same thing!
I see... I much prefer this new one. "Ping" just sounds like a weak arrow, bounding off one's armor.
Don't you dare answer her! I refuse you to let you make a mockery of the good name of L'Arachel!
~Player~, be wary. Natsuki is planning something...
It pleases me to see you've learned your place. Very well. My staff shall warm you up.
Playing by mere technicalities is no way to be.
Ha! It pleases me to see you've learned your place. Very well. I ask for a small break to fetch a replacement staff for this purpose.
This cannot be true, can it? I had thought that there was only one goddess!
I treasure the friendships of the royal twins of Renais above all else! Ahh... such a nice pair.
I do quite enjoy seafood... Rausten makes the finest in the world, and don't let anyone tell you otherwise.
Marth...? What an oddly familiar name...
You cannot be serious. Such language is unfit for even a pickpocket, much less an angel!
Do you think yourself my better? What an absurd thought! Very well, I will beat you at your own game!
If it's music you want, I'm sure I can provide a suitable tune. Listen to my melodious voice, in the name of truth, hope, and determination!
What a deprived question! Seduction is a sin, plain and simple!
I'm glad you asked. If I find you've earned my favor enough, I may treat you with a visit to Rausten. Oh, what a generous woman I am...
Obviously, I would like a betrothed who is sensible and just! I have no desire to be taken by a brute of a man... taken advantage of... oooohhhh...
There are a few bards I'm fond of back in Rausten. The trumpeters in particular are spectacular!
I will pass on your drinks. Alcohol is a vice, and I will not give into the temptation!
You will cease this inappropriate discussion at once! ...And stop looking at me like that, ~player~!
N-No, it's L'Arachel...
...Is this a joke? It's not funny.
W-We're becoming surrounded already! What's the plan, ~player~?
Ha! El Shaggy Blanco is no match for La-Rachel Blanca!
Hey, uh, ~player~? Could you choose opponents who are not completely broken next time?
My heavens! Is this a creature made up of... blood? No, be calm, L'Arachel... you must persevere!
A phantom such as yourself cannot possibly hope to frighten me. I shall banish you into the next world personally!
~Player~, do you know why the other players are eying each other? Do you think they're together?
Mhm! The seafood in Rausten is truly a delight... I pity those who never have an opportunity to sample it.
Oh, we had another player?
Excuse you, but your parents gave you that name! You should wear it with pride!
You'll return that top to me later, right? Relaxing on the beach in only half a suit would certainly make things more difficult.
Being recognized like this would be... less than ideal. ~Player~, do you think it would be simple to convince any passerby that I was a male?
B-By chance my swimsuit isn't returned... do you think the beach has a lax dress code? I ask that you check before we depart.
M-Make sure you take special care of that swimsuit. If word gets out that L'Arachel spent her day... in the nude... no, I refuse to even consider that possibility!
You dare suggest I should call you "master"? You should be ashamed! I... I... Ooh, fine! But I won't be pleased!
Wh -- "Master"? After all we've... I-I mean... Oh, very well! (I won't soon forgive this indignity!)
My dear friend, you always were my most enthusiastic supporter. Thank you for accompanying me to this game.
Rausten is a mountainous country, so I have no need for a swimsuit usually. This one I am adorned with was recommended to me by Princess Tana. I look beautiful in it, don’t I?
I am... unused to baring so much skin. However, I cannot practice my swimming otherwise.
Summer is a time for new experiences. I can do things like learn to fly a pegasus, or dabble in games like these.
Keep an eye out, alright ~player~? A swimsuit offers protection from none but the harsh heat of Magvel.
It's a pity Lord Ephraim and Lord Innes couldn't join. I'd love to see their legendary beach fights! ...N-No, it's entirely unrelated to them being in swimsuits!
Ahem! Let me be forward about the fact that I will not allow anyone to harm the good denizens of this realm. You are under Rausten's protection now.
Ah, how rude of me. I forgot to introduce ~player~, my humble companion. Oh, don't be so modest. Say hello!
To think, none of you have ever heard of me, the beautiful banisher of darkness? Inconceivable!
Gambling is a pox, a boil upon the fair skin of mankind. I shall have to teach you a lesson you won't soon forget!
Perhaps some of you are interested in what I do as priestess? All followers of the goddess seek to help others. I happen to do so through my healing and light magic.
I assure you, my friends, that I am no idle priestess. I travel around Magvel, protecting those in danger of monster threats. By comparison, this game is nothing!
O divine goddess, just as your Sacred Stones sealed away the Demon King hundreds of years ago, I call upon your aid for this very hand.
I needn't even look at my cards. As long as I have faith and righteousness on my side, I shan't lose!
I see that you're admiring my costume. Take a gooood long look, then!
Will you not don a costume, ~player~? How disappointing. I was hoping you would be more festive.
Rausten's festivals are very lively. Someday all of you, too, shall know the pleasure!
Mmm... this confection is delicious indeed. Would you like one?
This costume truly is perfect. Who would look at this and imagine I to be the Princess of Rausten?
A trick, is it? Dealer, you will not receive even a mote of candy! Not one!
And after all the hard work I put into my costume? You wound me!
I must find you a new pastime, ~player~. There are better ways to spend the harvest festival than this... sinful game.
Again? This has not been a fruitful harvest in the slightest!
Very well... you have forced my hand!
My beautiful costume... gone, like the night...
Why, thank you! It's nice to see that even an uncouth hothead such as yourself can appreciate my finer aspects.

condition.saying: doin' at a game like this

case.state: My motives are none of your concern. Please, simply sit back and mind your own business.
A shame. It seems the difference in our skill is quite palpable. Perhaps you should look into a different game.
I know you must be quite curious, so sit back, and I will show you now!
Ah, you must be mistaken. It is true, I am- er, I have the glitz of a princess, but alas, I am not!
Indeed! Any manner of undead I can deal with rather easily. They're actually rather low on the scale of danger to people like myself.
To be quite frank, I do not see that happening all that much. I am much more effective on the field than at a pulpit.
In spite of myself, yes. I do think I'm enjoying myself.
E-Even so, there is a limit to what most people should be able to see!
Do you truly expect me to believe a word you say?
Very perceptive of you, Mr. Angel.
Of course we do. ~Player~ is a valuable contributor to my cause!
Who could blame you? The entire prospect is entirely romantic...
Ah, finally, someone interested in the glory of Rausten! It's the gem of Magvel, you know.
If you are insinuating that I am anything less than a pristine holy woman, you will receive no mercy from me!
Is that so... I do have one thing to ask of you...
Forgive me. I know not what a "splicer" is.
Th-The nerve of you! No, I have not!
Ah, that's an easy one. Spit, every time.
This is a question I'm not very comfortable answering...!
Er, why? It's merely a name for a cat.
Well, if you truly must know, I came here at ~player~'s bequest.
L'Ara?! I don't recall giving you permission to give me a nickname!
How dare you? Do you not respect the flair I bring to every room I step in? I shall never forget this slight upon my value as a human!
On the contrary, my dear Mari. By doing so, I will prove that I have the moral superiority! It's genius!
I am no common merchant! If anything, I think you might be projecting!
Hmph. Very well, ~player~. This was nothing more than temporary protection for you, understood?
No parade here... unless you were planning to throw one in my honor.
Indeed! My dear Toyosatomimi no Miko, you have a keen eye for quality. Oh, but I'm, uh, certainly not a princess!
I believe you are mistaken. Rausten lies in the north, not the west.
Haha! You've asked for it now, foul witch! Prepare to be inquisited!
Gh-! Now you've done it!
My will shall be instilled! Bear witness!
Very well. If this is war, so be it! Face my judgment!
I can afford another hit or two. After all, I am sure providence will see me through safely.
A few dents in the armor shall not shake me. I trust in ~player~'s strategy.
Ah, but I am already used to them! Not only am I beautiful, but I often traveled incognito, just as I had at the start of this little game.
Why would I be anyone but myself?
I am? Are you a spy? No, wait-! A guardian angel!
Hmmph. I'll show you composure!
I do. However, ~player~ needs to start pulling some weight. I am nearly compromised!
Obviously, you are an important individual. Perhaps one that matches my own devotion.
I apologize. Perhaps I've acted too stand-offish...
My goals in this establishment have been declared from the start!
It seems my beauty is universally recognized! How pleasant.
I've already removed my armor.
There must be some mistake! I have nothing left to offer!
The only one being weird about this is you! And for the last time, I am a priestess, not a witch!
At least Pit's being a proper gentleman about this. The rest of you should follow his example.
Y-Yes! Sakura brings up a rather good point! Perhaps it'd be best to draw the line here?
Wha-? Er, that is to say, I meant to do that! Yes!
I thought this would be a fun time, but you've forced my hand!
Again? This swimsuit must be cursed! Did Princess Tana trick me?
This hasn't been relaxing at all!
Last one naked does not spare me the shame of baring myself to strangers!
What? I lost? Why, that hardly seems fair.
I lost? Are you certain you're not mistaken? It hardly seems proper for a pr- oopsie! Almost revealed my secret identity!
I should think that's enough! Behold, you servants of the Demon King!
Haha! Tremble in fear, servants of darkness!
There must be some mistake! No? Why... you're fortunate that I'm such a kind, gracious princess!
Am I not to be counted amongst these? I'm a princess, surely that's nearly enough a queen... right?
This is for the best. Who knows what else you all might take off?
As you well know, this isn't the sort of thing a princess is known for doing. I trust you're suitably grateful!
I was hoping that I wouldn't be asked to join you all.
Hmph! Unacceptable! Just because everyone else has -- Ooh!
You couldn't just grant me this victory? Only to preserve what's left of my modesty?
Am I called upon to join you all? I'll do it, but this doesn't make us the same!
Of course, I've only done this to keep you safe for another round, ~player~. You may thank me now.
I did not lose! I'm simply giving ~player~ a chance to strategize! Laugh while you can!
You've awakened the righteous fury of Rausten!
Beware, you evildoers, for I will strike you down with my righteous fervor!
You haven't bested the princess of Rausten! You've only set me back for a moment!
You learn more from failure than success, you know!
No! Have I been beaten again? This game is due for a change in rules!
I can manage another loss for your sake, ~player~, but I certainly hope it pays off!
Is there not something to be said about discretion when I'm asked to bare my -- Mmmm...
This must be a test from the gods!
I-I'm sure Rausten has gold to spare. I simply mustn't allow this to tarnish her reputation!
~Player~, is there not some sort of redress? Recourse? Anything?
W-What? How... could it be? Have the gods abandoned me?
I just feel like being alone and weeping for a bit...
Misfortune cannot quell the light of L'Arachel!
I have to stay strong. My holy endeavor cannot suffer because of mere misfortune!
I cannot remain quiet any longer!
Yaah! I will show you the power of Rausten!
Now listen here! Don't think you'll get away with bullying Rausten's princess!
This is for the best. What better chance will I get to show you how to lose with grace?
This is ridiculous! Rules or no... no, I'll do it. It mustn't be said that a princess couldn't even cope with a simple card game.
What? Again? Have I not lost enough for you? You... scoundrels!
Do not think for a moment that I can't bear another loss!
What? This can't be!
I will continue. But I won't be happy about it!
M-me? Wh-why I... I... I have no fear! Oh, I should have departed some time ago...
But all I have left is... Would you truly leave a princess standing here, without... so much as a towel?
No! How could this be! Why should I be the first to lose my modesty?
If only to comply with the rules of this game, I shall remove my overcoat.
As a troubadour, it is quite important to be well-versed in a variety of remedies.
I suppose I will not need these boots for now. My stockings will suffice.
Now my bottles will be smudged. Are you happy?
Now you shall know true terror! Watch as the Madness Flask turns things around in my favor... e-eh?
Then let us agree to disagree on that front.
Hmph! A lady such as myself does not drink alcohol. Tea, on the other hand, is acceptable.
If you truly mean to help, then you shall remain there and look pretty while I partake in this loss.
Yes! Please do! It shall make this... somewhat less embarrassing.
Ugh... very well.
And if we are? I am well traveled; is it really such a stretch to think I'd meet other visitors to here?
Indeed... wait, what was that last part?
It'd be the perfect place if it wasn't set upon by monsters. And that is where my righteous mission comes in!
Your notions of us are very corrupted!
Why is it that so many men seem so undignified? Even knights and monarchs can be violent and ill-mannered.
As in... artificial monsters? Why would I ever consider becoming like the beasts that murdered my parents?
Y-You don't know what you're talking about! I am no pervert!
...Is that not what you meant? Why do you look at me like that?
I-I would rather...! Oh, very well. But it's so very embarrassing...
It seems harmless enough. ...Pussy?
I have no idea who that is, nor do I care if they're giving me a bad name.
O-Occult? How dare you lump me in with those shamans and druids!
Pardon you, but I am a troubadour. These boots never even have to touch the ground on my journeys.
Forgive me, but I ask that you elaborate.
~Player~, tell her. You serve me and my crusade!
~Player~ is the most brilliant tactician I know, and I thank you to not say otherwise.
True, Dozla and Rennac could use better decorum... but don't underestimate us!
I am a humble holy woman, and I would appreciate being respected and admired as such.
Oh, very well. But these are specially made for me as priestess. If you break them, it'll be your funeral!
I already said my piece here. And even if they were to get dirty, Dozla would be more than happy to polish them.
V-Virginal? ...Don't get any funny ideas! If anyone goes near me, I will not hesitate to defend myself!
Do you know how painful it feels to conceal my identity?
Spirit? You seem to be in possession of knowledge even I am not privy to.
As right as you are, I do not recall allowing you to call me "hime".
N-No, I cannot falter right at the end! In spite of what Sakura thinks, I, L'Arachel, will do it!
What kind of priestess do you take me for? The goddess would smite me herself were I to abandon her holy mission!
All I wished was to protect the citizens from monsters, yet I'm getting yelled at. (Sniff...)
Indeed. It's a constant struggle with... everything going on.
I-I mean it when I say no looking! That's an order!
I-! Very well. I'll do it, you'll see! Er, rather, I ask that you not see! Look away!
Do not make this more gross than it already is, you perverted little girl!
D-Do not try to flatter me! I refuse to give in to any advances!
Out of the goodness of my heart, I shall remove my towel.
These are surprisingly easy to remove.
You seem confused.
Do you mind? A princess removing her entire swimsuit requires a little more privacy!
First I went out in such a daring ensemble, then I'm made to wear nothing whatsoever...!
No. A princess must remain strong. I will overcome! The might of Rausten shines within me!
I don't know what manner of trick this is, but you won't break my will! I am Princess L'Arachel!
A holy woman does not engage in such... debasement! I'm only making myself comfortable, you see.
If I must, the least I could do is get a bit more comfortable.
Very well. I suppose making myself comfortable isn't beneath me. I trust you're all duly grateful.
For I, Priestess- no, Princess L'Arachel, will be -- eh?
It is the light of Rausten, bestowed upon I, the incognito princess L'Arachel herself -- my staff!
I am no ordinary priestess! I am Princess L'Arachel, and you -- what?
I cannot give up yet! I suppose you've won my greaves, if nothing else.
Don't be so haughty! I won't give up so easily. I might even be more comfortable without my boots.
Don't think I approve of anything happening here! But could I truly be the victor if I ignored the rules?
If nothing else, these will buy me another round to defeat you all.
These gloves had better not have so much as a spot on them when I'm through!
You can keep your snide comments to yourself, if you please!
These cards can't be clean... Still, L'Arachel doesn't cower from a bit of filth!
I-I can even do this! Watch me! Wait! Don't watch me! Perverts, each and every one of you!
I can't believe I would go so far. But this is for a righteous cause, I'm certain!
Avert your eyes! I'm doing this to show my courage, the least you could do is give me a moment!
My test may be to disrobe, but you mustn't look upon my body! I forbid it!
Mmmm...
Th-this is wildly inappropriate! Wh... why can't I stop myself?
Baring my bosom ought to have sufficed... Oh, that Dozla were here...
If I see even a single sweet vanish, you shall face the righteous fury of Rausten!
However, it would be wise to not inquire about the content within those bottles. Mwahaha...
And, failing that, I have my trusty stallion to carry me.
That said, do not press me, for on this night of nights, I have a treat prepared. Mwahaha...
Huh? N-No, this was a mistake...! But, at least my undergarments survived the ordeal.
This is more suited for birthdays than the harvest festival, I believe...
I have no qualms baring my own shoulders, of course.
Hmph. Do your best to control yourself. You needn't ogle me all night.
Truly? I do enjoy a good massage... perhaps we'll see if you can give ones as good as my attendant, Dozla.
You had better stick to praying, or I'll be giving you a reason to pray.
You will find I am no mere folk. There is only one L'Arachel, and she is far beyond what you know of the clergy!
Is that so? I always knew I had favor with the gods, but to hear from the source is appreciated.
Is that so? Perhaps I'd be happier to hear that if you could've kept yourself decent.
I'd rather keep my secrets concealed, thank you.
We must try thrice as hard now. My modesty alone is at stake!
Much more than... my vision, I'm afraid.
Y-Yes, we have a good quantity of able-bodied men.
Have what you wish, but I will not be a part of it.
I ask that you get on with it already, dealer!
Yes. A hard no.
Having the likes of Prince Ephraim... forcing himself on me... ohhhh... ah! No!
All this says is that you don't know what you're talking about!
Is there anything wrong with wanting a strong and steadfast hero to fight for justice by your side? Rennac oft calls me out on my dream...
Indeed. You must have a lot of animal lovers in your audience.
We shall see. When people see me in action, they shall know who the true one to follow will be.
My magic is pure and virtuous, just as the gods intended!
My steed easily keeps me in pristine condition. You look like you'd get along well with it.
W-Wed? It seems much to early to discuss that!
It matters little. I am a holy woman, and my mission far exceeds whatever relationship you think you have with my strategist.
Did you hear that? It would seem we truly are blessed by the gods! Let us proceed as planned!
While a Carrot Lance does sting, that's not my method of combat.
You have yet to earn my respect. Move along.
I will make do without my staff. ~Player~, redouble your efforts!
You saw nothing! I will have my retribution!
Alas, that staff has run its course. Once it fades, not even a Hammerne can repair it.
Jealousy is unbecoming of a young woman. I suggest you control that temper.
Forgive me if I've never heard of a Robin. They don't sound very intriguing.
